title: Loving Hut - Luodong
description: Part of international chain of vegan restaurants opened by followers of Supreme Master Ching Hai, an advocate for vegetarian living. Each location is individual family owned and operated. Serves food, non-alcoholic beverages, and vegan snacks. Lunchtime is simple menu a la carte or buffet where you choose what you'd like and pay by weight. Dinner is a la carte menu and hot pots. Simple setup on the ground floor, nicer banquet style setting on 2nd floor. Name in Chinese is 愛家國際餐飲--羅東喜悅店.
